authors.name: Anna S Fomsgaard
authors.affiliation: Statens Serum Institut; University of Copenhagen

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"21hqe","text":"The TELE-Vir project key aim is to develop a fast point-of-incidence (poi) toolbox for identification and characterisation of emerging virus threats for humans and/or domestic and wildlife animals. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1onlp","text":"Presented here is a protocol including sample pretreatment, NA extraction and random amplification for metagenomic virus detection using the MinION device (Oxford Nanopore Technologies)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"2i34s","text":"This protocol was prepared for a workshop held the 23-24 June 2022 at Statens Serum Institut, Denmark. Here 25 TELEVIR partners from 10 European countries participated to train in the usage of a field-deployable point-of-incidence toolbox to identify emgerging virus threats. The protocol was used to detec SARS-CoV-2 and Human Papillomavirus a RNA and DNA virus detection test-of-concept.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

references.title: Rapid, Safe, and Simple Manual Bedside Nucleic Acid Extraction for the Detection of Virus in Whole Blood Samples.

references.title: Inactivation of orthopoxvirus for diagnostic PCR analysis.

references.title: The microbial detection array for detection of emerging viruses in clinical samples--a useful panmicrobial diagnostic tool.

{"blocks":[{"key":"e00lg","text":"Per X number of samples, aliquot in cryotubes or Eppendorf tubes
  Magnetic Glass Particles (MGPs) in an Eppendorf tube
 Wash buffer I in a 4.5 ml cryotube
  Wash buffer II in an Eppendorf tube
  Wash buffer III in a 3.6 ml cryotube
   Elution buffer in an Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":156,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":195,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":234,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ouk9","text":"Prepare one sample at the time. {"blocks":[{"key":"151ov","text":"Add 960 µl MGPs to 2 ml solution of sample and MPLB-buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ale58","text":"Put lid on and turn tube in hand gently until well mixed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"657a0","text":"Attach magnet and trap beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d651l","text":"Pour solution into trash tube. The MGPs should stay behind trapped on the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"35et6","text":"Pour Wash buffer I in the sample tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43deh","text":"Put a lid on, remove magnet and turn the tube in hand gently until well mixed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f5qa","text":"Attach magnet and trap beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"64trg","text":"Put a lid on, remove magnet and turn the tube in hand gently until well mixed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"amcbn","text":"Attach magnet and trap beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ukik","text":"Pour solution into trash tube. The MGPs should stay behind trapped on the side of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f8d4e","text":"Pour Wash buffer III in the sample tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hn97","text":"Put a lid on, remove magnet and turn the tube in hand gently until well mixed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3i75p","text":"Attach magnet and trap beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
